__prompts__.git_base_url:
git_base_url - Remote URL to host your new repositories (git), e.g.
       https://github.com/ai4os-hub (i.e. at github)
__prompts__.project_name: project_name - Short name of your project (max 3 words)
__prompts__.author_name: author_name - Author name(s) (and/or your organization/company/team). If many, separate by comma
__prompts__.author_email: author_email - E-Mail(s) of main author(s). If many, separate by comma
__prompts__.description: description - A short description of the project
__prompts__.open_source_license: open_source_license - Select one of the licenses, default is MIT. For more info: https://opensource.org/licenses
__prompts__.docker_baseimage: docker_baseimage - Docker image your Dockerfile starts from (FROM <docker_baseimage>). Don't provide the tag, yet
__prompts__.baseimage_cpu_tag: baseimage_cpu_tag - CPU tag for the baseimage, e.g. 2.9.1. Has to match python3!
__prompts__.baseimage_gpu_tag: baseimage_gpu_tag - GPU tag for the baseimage, e.g. 2.9.1-gpu. Has to match python3!
__prompts__.failure_notify: failure_notify - Receive an email if module build fails
